timeline.bodyText: If you're trying to suppress something from Checkstyle, you should be suppressing individual checks, not everything. https://checkstyle.org/config_filters.html#SuppressWarningsFilter might be useful
timeline.author: zml2008

replies.bodyText: I don't want to fully suppress it, it's just this one place
replies.author: JRoy

timeline.message: Only apply java plugin to subprojects
